archimate:BusinessRole.name: Governance Framework Layer Roles
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: The business roles defined at the Governance Framework layer of Sovrin Infrastructure. These include Governance Authority, Trust Anchor, Credential Registry, Auditor, and Auditor Accreditor. See Appendix H.
